thread.section_title: 365 Inn (Beijing Qianmen) - UPDATED 2017 Hostel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location!
thread.title_full: Perfect location! - Review of 365 Inn (Beijing Qianmen), Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Yosua S
title: Perfect location!
text:
This hotel is very easy to reach for first timer visiting Beijing. The fact that this hostel is also several minutes away from Qianmen station, which is in Line 2, makes it very convenient to go anywhere in Beijing.
The hostel also has a bar that serves a pint for 10RMB, which is very cheap.
Staff is very friendly, hostel is clean and wifi is fast. So that's everything you could've asked for from a good hostel.
